channel.title: sdn on PALMXIN'S BLOG
channel.description: Recent content in sdn on PALMXIN'S BLOG

item.description: 1. VPP语句学习 1.1. NAT44: set int state GigabitEthernetb/0/0 up set int state GigabitEthernet3/0/0 up set interface ip address GigabitEthernet3/0/0 192.168.0.12/24 set interface ip address GigabitEthernetb/0/0 192.168.219.2/24 nat44 plugin enable ip route add 0.0.0.0/0 via 192.168.0.1 1.2. SNAT： nat44 add interface address GigabitEthernet3/0/0 或 nat44 add address 192.168.0.12 set int nat44 in GigabitEthernetb/0/0 out GigabitEthernet3/0/0 1.3. 一对一映射： 打开nat44 forwarding enable后，做一对一 nat44 add address 192.168.0.12 nat44 add static mapping local 192.168.219.128 external 192.
